long_description: Offering lightweight coverage for cool-weather trail adventures, the weather-resistant, stretchy Woolrich Vector vest keeps your core covered while letting you move freely. Lightweight, breathable polyester/spandex fabric blend feels soft against skin and stretches to allow full range of motion; Durable Water Repellent finish sheds light rain. Zippered hand pockets and zippered chest pocket. Woolrich Vector vest features a drawcord-adjustable hem to seal in warmth. Closeout.
short_description: Offering lightweight coverage for cool-weather trail adventures, the weather-resistant, stretchy Woolrich Vector vest keeps your core covered while letting you move freely.
